attributes.action: usher in a new epoch, replacing AD with the more modern OE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In modern Britain, having a system of dating described as "The year of our Lord" is simply embarrassing. To represent Britain as a dynamic, forward looking country, we should adopt a new "Open Era", or OE. The Epoch used should be that of Unix, 00:00:00 UTC, 1st January 1970. The term Open Era not only recognises the origins of the epoch with the Open Group, but also the open access to information that typifies our times.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
